detectors.description: Wormhole.hashMessage(bytes) (contracts/Wormhole.sol#160-162) uses a weak PRNG: keccak256(bytes)(_msg) (contracts/Wormhole.sol#161)
Wormhole.verifyReceiptID(bytes32,bytes) (contracts/Wormhole.sol#152-154) uses a weak PRNG: signerAddr == _receiptID.toEthSignedMessageHash().recover(_signature) (contracts/Wormhole.sol#153)
